entities.name: scabbers
entities.description: Scabbers was frozen in midair, his small gray form twisting madly.

entities.name: crookshanks
entities.description: Crookshanks was spitting and snarling on the bed; the hair on his back was standing up.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: He was a very short man, hardly taller than Harry

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: He was a very short man, hardly taller than Harry and Hermione

relationships.description: A head was shooting upward from the ground; limbs were sprouting; a moment later, a man was standing where Scabbers had been
